problem_definition.command_line: optimality op_A.oml; optimality op_B.oml; optimality op_C.oml

variables.variable: from fluidity_tools import stat_parser import glob gradient_conv = [stat_parser(x)["time_integral_ad_gradient_error"]["convergence"][-1] for x in sorted(glob.glob("op_?.stat"))]

pass_tests.test: assert min(gradient_conv) > 1.8 # more tolerant because it's stochastic
